osvSchema.details: A GPU kernel can read sensitive data from another GPU kernel (even from another user or app) through an optimized GPU memory region called _local memory_ on various architectures.

description_data.value: A GPU kernel can read sensitive data from another GPU kernel (even from another user or app) through an optimized GPU memory region called _local memory_ on various architectures.

description.value: CWE-119 Improper Restriction of Operations within the Bounds of a Memory Buffer
CWE-200 Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor

descriptions.value: A GPU kernel can read sensitive data from another GPU kernel (even from another user or app) through an optimized GPU memory region called _local memory_ on various architectures.

Un kernel de GPU puede leer datos confidenciales de otro kernel de GPU (incluso de otro usuario o aplicación) a través de una región de memoria de GPU optimizada llamada _local memory_ en varias arquitecturas.
